name: opskit-lite
author: Jagath Jai Kumar, Cody Richter

scripts.start-electron:default: export DISPLAY=:0.0 && export ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:3000 && electron main
scripts.start-electron:windows: set DISPLAY=:0.0 && set ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:3000 && set ENVIRONMENT=debug && electron main
scripts.debug:default: export ENVIRONMENT=debug && concurrently 'npm run start-react' 'npm run start-backend' 'sleep 5 && npm run start-electron'
scripts.debug:windows: set ENVIRONMENT=debug && concurrently 'npm run start-react' 'npm run start-backend'
scripts.dev:default: export ENVIRONMENT=development && concurrently 'npm run start-react' 'sleep 5 && npm run start-electron'
scripts.dev:windows: set ENVIRONMENT=development && concurrently 'npm run start-react' 'sleep 5 && npm run start-electron'
scripts.clean:default: rm -rf python/venv-app backend_build backend_dist backend_spec build dist backend/venv-app
scripts.clean:windows: rmdir python\venv-app backend_build backend_dist backend_spec build dist backend/venv-app
scripts.test:default: export DISPLAY=:0 && export ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:3000 && concurrently 'react-scripts test ./tests --runInBand --verbose --env=jest-environment-jsdom-sixteen --watchAll=false'
scripts.test:windows: set DISPLAY=:0 && set ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:3000 &&  react-scripts test ./tests --runInBand --verbose --env=jest-environment-jsdom-sixteen --watchAll=false
scripts.pytest:default: export PYTHONPATH=$PWD/backend && export DISPLAY= && cd ../backend && pytest && cd ..
scripts.pytest:windows: set PYTHONPATH=$PWD/backend &&set DISPLAY= && cd ../backend && pytest && cd ..
scripts.package-electron: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build-python && electron-builder build -c.extraMetadata.main=main/index.js --publish never

description: An operational toolkit for triage and simplification of common everyday investigative tasks.
